授業方法:
(a) Lectures about the basics of cross-cultural psychology and (b) discussion using case studies provided in class.
This class is offered as a face-to-face class on campus, as well as a real-time online course, using Zoom.
Please email me at gennakao@kwansei.ac.jp for the link of Zoom meeting.

トピック.授業計画1:
The following is the modules of this course:
Module 1: What is Cultural Psychology? (Week 1-2)
Module 2: Cognition and Perception (Week 3-4)
Module 3: Self (Week 5-6)
Module 4: Emotion (Week 7-8)
Module 5: Groups and Relations hips (Week 9-10)
Module 6: Culture as Adaptation to Local Environment (Week 11-12)
Module 7: Elementary School Visit (Tentatively Week 13)
The summary/recap of the semester(Week 14)
トピック.授業外学習2: Students are required to attend class regularly, and submit a short reflection paper(e.g., questions and/or comments about lectures and/or in-class discussions) at the end of each class.
